page.title: 10Government Chaldon Hills
page.content: The block is represented in the European Parliament by Mr. B. Cassidy, member for Dorset East and Hampshire West Constituency. In the House of Commons Lord Cranborne is the Member for Dorset South. Representation on Dorset County Council is divided between Egdon Heath, represented by Mrs. D.Franklin and Purbeck Hills, represented by Mr. P.Duffy. Representation on Purbeck District Council is again divided. Winfrith Ward represented by Mrs. B.Debenham, and West Purbeck by Mrs. C.Bond. Four Parish Councils are responsible for different parts of the block:- Chaldon Herring,East Lulworth, West Lulworth and Winfrith Newburgh.
